text: iṉṉum allāh tāṉ paṭaittuḷḷavaṟṟiliruntu uṅkaḷukku niḻalkaḷaiyum ēṟpaṭuttiṉāṉ; malaikaḷiliruntu uṅkaḷukku(t taṅkumiṭaṅkaḷāka) kukaikaḷaiyum ēṟpaṭuttiṉāṉ; iṉṉum veppattiliruntu uṅkaḷaip pātukākkakkūṭiya caṭṭaikaḷaiyum uṅkaḷuṭaiya pōril uṅkaḷai pātukākkakkūṭiya kavacaṅkaḷaiyum uṅkaḷukkāka amaittāṉ; nīṅkaḷ (avaṉukku) muṟṟilum vaḻippaṭṭu naṭappatāka, ivvāṟu taṉ aruṭkoṭaiyai uṅkaḷukkup pūrttiyākkiṉāṉ
